name: Cold Cable: Lifeshift (itch) (TREEWISE)
description:
Take role as a survivor in COLD CABLE: LIFESHIFT, a 3D First Person action-puzzle game, with survival elements, where you have to gather supplies, control radiation level and shoot monsters on your way to reach the next level. If you want to play this game, get ready for the chaos.

This game still under development and the first episode can be played on this demo version of the game. Please consider leaving a constructive review to help us go in the right way :)

The full version can be found on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1043610/Cold_Cable_Lifeshift/
